CustomField.description: Defines the name of the uploaded file. If the placeholder "{RecordName}" is used, "{RecordName}" will be replaced by the name of the file's parent record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the name of the uploaded file. If the placeholder "{RecordName}" is used, "{RecordName}" will be replaced by the name of the file's parent record.
CustomField.label: Naming Convention
